name: Lazer Quest
description:
Overview

I mean it's laser tag. Just a sandbox. Worked a lot on the movement. Level design hard. Shooting fun. Mirrors. One week prototype.

Controls

Controls are also configurable at the main menu.

CrouchLeft ShiftShootLeft-ClickAim Down SightRight-ClickToss MirrorHold Middle Mouse, then releaseSlow TimeCaps Lock
